Class Bullet

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ardor3d.intersection.Pickable, com.ardor3d.scenegraph.hint.Hintable, com.ardor3d.scenegraph.Renderable, com.ardor3d.util.export.Savable

    public class Bullet
extends com.ardor3d.scenegraph.shape.Sphere
implements com.ardor3d.util.export.Savable
    The Class made to hold inside of it the ability to create a portal
